solution_line_template: Jill watched one show that was {multiplier} times longer than {first_show_duration} minutes, so it was {multiplier}*{first_show_duration}=<<{multiplier}*{first_show_duration}={second_show_duration}>>{second_show_duration} minutes long.

Jill also watched another show that was {first_show_duration} minutes long, so the total time Jill spent was {second_show_duration}+{first_show_duration}=<<{second_show_duration}+{first_show_duration}={total_time_spent}>>{total_time_spent} minutes
